title: NeedToKnow
description: Restricts access to a resource to only those actors whose stated purpose requires it, implementing the NIST SP 800-53 AC-3(3) mandatory access control principle. JustificationRequired enforces that actors must declare their purpose before access is granted.

objective.description: A free-text statement of the business or operational purpose that justifies access. This is a purpose declaration string, not a reference to an ActorObjective node.
